name: Magma Runner (Mitnik3)
description:
This procedurally generated combat platformer challenges your reflexes. Can you escape the lava? 

This game is a submission to the GitHub Game Off Jam 2022. The theme was ‘cliche.’ Our game is based on the cliche of ‘lava rising’ in games. 

Run through the procedurally generated landscape as fast as you can to escape the molten lava. Use our omnidirectional combat system to defeat enemies that rise from the lava.  These enemies are interconnected to the lava, so killing them slows down the lava. And watch out for fireballs!

Controls- used WASD to move, space bar to jump, and mouse to attack and block(left and right click)
